about_the_game:
A decade has passed since the foreign god’s appearance, filling the world with madness and plunging the world into a never-ending winter night. Humanity has fought back but is still on its last legs against anomalous humanoid creatures with logic-defying powers. One of these fighters, Weiss, loses their partner in a recent attack and has to fight to get them back against all odds.

Play as Weiss Herber (they/them), a Scavenging leader for one of the last strongholds of humanity as they fight against the hordes.

in this tale you'll find...

  • 50k+ words

  • a queer romance between the main character and their male partner

  • a story of prevailing against the odds

content_descriptors.notes: This is a post-apocalyptic story set in a fictional fantasy version of Earth. While there is nothing realistically depicted, there are scenes of fighting with can include blood loss, death, and more depending on choices. There is also frequent cursing.

name: Lost Lune ~ the foreign god's eternal night

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 8 or higher
  • Processor: AMD
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

short_description: A post-apocalyptic horror fantasy about a never-ending winter night.
